original_text: The master sent another servant to go to the farmers. They hit him with sticks too, and they did other bad things to him. They also sent him away with nothing.
korean_text: 다시 다른 종을 보내니 그도 몹시 때리고 능욕하고 거저 보내었거늘

sentences.original_text: They hit him with sticks too
and they did other bad things to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그에게 다른 나쁜 일들을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They also sent him away with nothing
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그를 아무것도 없이 내쫓았습니다
